cookie_title: Brighty list uses only required cookies
cookie_message_a: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and you cannot disable their use.
cookie_message_b: They do not store any personally identifiable information.
privacy_note_message: This is only an example project. Anyone providing their personal data does so at their own risk.
privacy_personal_description: any information enabling identification of a person or such that may be associated with such a person.
privacy_personal_when_collected: Personal data is collected during registration on the website.
privacy_personal_why_collected: We collect only the necessary data for the functioning of the website:
privacy_personal_why_collected_2: sending reminders to the e-mail address provided.
privacy_personal_protection_1: We do not use SSL certificates or other security.
privacy_personal_protection_2: All data is deleted / reset every Sunday at 12:00 GMT + 0.
terms_note_message: This is only an example project. The site only allows you to test the publicly available code.
terms_requirement: Each user must agree to the following points:
terms_requirement_1: all data is deleted / reset every Sunday at 12:00 GMT + 0,
terms_requirement_2: the site only allows you to test the publicly available code,
terms_requirement_3: the number of maximum accounts is limited to 4 including 2 predefined ones,
terms_requirement_4: the number of possible messages sent with reminders is limited to 80 / day for the entire website,
terms_requirement_5: website functionality will not be developed,
about_purpose: Bright List is a portfolio project that was made for learning purpose.
about_purpose_note: This project is for testing purpose only.
about_desc_1: Bright list is a project that allows users to create list of their task and set reminders for those task.
about_desc_2: User can mark task for auto completion on end date time or manual completion.
about_desc_3: Reminders for tasks are send as simple eMails via SendGrid.
about_desc_4: Additionally users get eMails when their tasks are overdue (when manual completion is selected).
about_implemented_2: 2. Signing up new users (maximum 3 new users per week),
about_implemented_3: 3. Updating user informations such as: nickname, eMail address, password (blocked in testing version),
about_implemented_5: 5. Reseting user password, sending password reset link to user (blocked in testing version),
about_implemented_6: 6. User can create/delete/update tasks and reminders for those tasks,
about_implemented_7: 7. Service for sending eMail with reminders, and overdue tasks to user,
about_implemented_8: 8. User, Task, Reminders and other informations are stored in MySql database,
about_implemented_9: 9. Scheduled redefinition of exemplary data every 7 days on sundays 12:00 UTC,
